item.title: HELPP! thank you ^^
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

server.java

package com.rs;

import java.math.BigInteger;

import com.rs.game.WorldTile;
import com.rs.utils.Utils;

public final class Settings {

public static final String SERVER_NAME = "Foxtrot 718";
public static int PORT_ID = 43595;

public static final String[] OWNERS = { "khenz" };
public static boolean ZOMBIE_ENABLED = true;

public static final WorldTile START_PLAYER_LOCATION = new WorldTile(2973, 3287, 0);
public static final WorldTile RESPAWN_PLAYER_LOCATION = new WorldTile(2973, 3287, 0);

public static final int droppedItemDelay = 180;
public static final double SKILL_RING_MOD = 1.2;

public static final boolean enableConsole = true;
public static boolean enableSfs = true;

public static final int CLIENT_BUILD = 718;
public static final int CUSTOM_CLIENT_BUILD = 1;

loader.java

import java.applet.Applet;

import javax.swing.*;

import java.awt.event.*;
import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Dimension;
import java.net.URL;
import java.util.Properties;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;

public class Loader extends Applet {

private static final long serialVersionUID = 7639088664641445302L;
public static final double VERSION = 1.0;
public static final String CLIENT_TITLE = "supremescape";
public static final String FRAME_TITLE = "supremescape"+VERSION+"";
public static final String SERVER_IP = "supremescape.no-ip.org";
public static final int SERVER_PORT = 43595;
public static final int REVISION = 718;
public static final int SUB_REVISION = 1;

public static final boolean LOBBY_ENABLED = false;
public static final boolean DISABLE_XTEA_CRASH = true;
public static final boolean DISABLE_USELESS_PACKETS = true;
public static final boolean DISABLE_RSA = false;
public static final boolean useIsaac = false;
public static final boolean usingRS = false;

public static Loader instance;

public static void main(String[] args) {
	Loader loader = instance = new Loader();
	loader.doFrame();
}

public void init() { 
	instance = this;
	doApplet();
}

enabled firewall port 43595

portforward using uttorent butstill error game js5connect

but i can play this using local host ip ;/ when i change it to my ip it error
